price: Anaasε wͻn adwen na εhyε wͻn saa, anaasε wͻyε nnipa a wͻ’te atua?
arabic: أَمۡ تَأۡمُرُهُمۡ أَحۡلَٰمُهُم بِهَٰذَآۚ أَمۡ هُمۡ قَوۡمٞ طَاغُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: am tamuruhum aḥlāmuhum bihādhā am hum qawmun ṭāghūna
